org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.bucket.significant

Class SignificantTermsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.AbstractAggregationBuilder
      • org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.AggregationBuilder<SignificantTermsBuilder>
        • org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.bucket.significant.SignificantTermsBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToXContent

    public class SignificantTermsBuilder
extends AggregationBuilder<SignificantTermsBuilder>
    Creates an aggregation that finds interesting or unusual occurrences of terms in a result set.

    This feature is marked as experimental, and may be subject to change in the future. If you use this feature, please let us know your experience with it!

        Define a regular expression that will determine what terms should be aggregated. The regular expression is based on the Pattern class.
